question: Which of the following union ministries has won the 'Swachchta Hi Seva' award, recently?
explanation: The Ministry of Railways has been declared the best department for its contribution to \"Swachchta Pakhwada\" under the \"Swachchta Hi Seva\" category of awards in an inter-ministry initiative organised by the Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation to promote cleanliness in government offices and health facilities. The award was presented to the Railway Ministry on the 4th anniversary of the Swachh Bharat Mission. The \'Swachchta Hi Seva\' campaign was launched in 2017 to spur the public to donate their time for building toilets and cleaning public places.
